actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 relating to diversion of water from the Great Lakes.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to make the prohibition on Great Lakes diversions inapplicable to any new diversion of water which will not exceed an average of 5,000,000 gallons per day in any 30-day period.

titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 relating to diversion of water from the Great Lakes.
